item.title: Factual tree
item.description: Tilt to alter the angle and number of branching

item.title: Snowflake
item.description: Make your own artwork. Place your phone faceup to lock artwork, then set to display the locked artwork.

item.title: Worm
item.description: Click on a place for the worm to hang. While it is crawling, you can press it to make it drop back to the ground.

item.title: Gecko
item.description: Gecko that likes to stick it tongue to something

item.title: Puff
item.description: Click on creature to expand it or elsewhere to move the creature. When it gets too big, it flows around randomly

item.title: Bubbletea
item.description: Tilt to pour drink, click to change between bubble tea and water. Don't ask me why there is unlimited supply.

item.title: Blue growth
item.description: Simplified from the work of Elisabeth TheAwsome (Open processing)
